author: COMSOL
description: A tapered slot antenna, also known as a Vivaldi antenna, is useful for wideband applications. In this example, an exponential function is used for the taper profile. The objective is to compute the far-field pattern and the impedance of the structure. Good matching is observed over a wide frequency band.
label: vivaldi_antenna.mph
name: root
